name: InteractionReason
comment: Maintains  valid values that indicate the reasons for interaction.Examples of interaction reasons include:* Address Update* Balance Incorrect* Bill Copy Not Sent* Bill Cycle Changed* Bill Cycle Enquiry* Cannot Make Calls* Cannot Receive Calls* Cannot Send MMS
vf short description: Maintains  valid values that indicate the reasons for interaction.

fields.name: InteractionReasonSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: InteractionReasonKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the interaction reason in ALDM. Each interaction reason key value represents a unique interaction reason. Generated Key based on Interaction Reason Id and Interaction Reason Source Ind

fields.name: InteractionReasonDesc
fields.comment: Describes the interaction reason. InteractionReason.fullLabelDisplay or InteractionItemReason.fullLabelDisplay

fields.name: InteractionReasonId
fields.comment: Reference Identifier for the interaction reason in the source system. InteractionReason.reason or InteractionItemReason.interactionItemReason

fields.name: InteractionReasonSourceId
fields.comment: Unique identifier for the interaction reason in the source system.

fields.name: InteractionReason1Id
fields.comment: Stores the Level 1 reason for the Interaction Topic.Example values are:  Device Care  Account Management  Billing

fields.name: InteractionReason2Id
fields.comment: Stores the Level 2 reason (sub reason) for the Interaction Topic.Example values are:  Troubleshoot  Change Contact Info  Create Billing Case

fields.name: InteractionReasonLevelInd
fields.comment: Indicates the Interaction Reason Topic Level. 1 indicates 1st level of topic 2 indicates the second level (sub topic).

fields.name: InteractionReasonDesc1
fields.comment: Stores the title of the Interaction Reason Level 1

fields.name: InteractionReasonDesc2
fields.comment: Stores the title description of the Interaction Level 2 reason (sub-reason).

fields.name: InteractionReasonSourceInd
fields.comment: The source for the interaction reason whether "Interaction" or "interaction Item" If source is partyInteraction-referencedata.interactionReason then "Interaction" else "Interaction Item"

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
